results.name: a(n) is the number of powers Pi^m between e^n and e^(n+1).
comment: Characteristic function of A059561. - _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 22 2017
link: Hans Havermann & Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
program: (PARI) a(n)=(n+1)\log(Pi) - n\log(Pi) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jan 16 2017
xref: Cf. A059562 (positions of zeros after the initial a(0)=0), A059561 (of ones).
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
